name: VRDJ
description:
Hello! If you are a DJ or you dream of becoming one, this game is for You!
VRDJ is a realistic DJ equipment simulator (two players and mixer).
This game was created in collaboration with famous djs, and we were able to reproduce all the experience of the DJ equipment and the creation of mixes.
The game has 10 realistic venues for your amazing parties! And you won’t be alone there!
There will be dancing guys and girls with you at the party!
Please check out game trailer for details!
We are constantly working on new game features and improvements. We are always open to your creative ideas. If you have any wishes, just write to us!
Warning! The game contains adult content. Such as: Dancing girls in revealing outfits, as well as topless guys.
Let's Go, DJ!
